Question
========
How do you open the command palette to quickly run commands in Positron?

Answerlist
----------
* Open the Terminal tab and type `palette`
* Right-click the Activity Bar and select “Command Mode”
* The command palette is only available in VS Code, not Positron
* Click the search box at the top, choose “Show and Run Commands,” and start typing

Solution
========
Use the search box at the top of the window, pick “Show and Run Commands,” and type the command you want.
